Three-point charter for Korea's reunification supported 
    Pyongyang, October 26 (KCNA) -- Jose Francisco Aguilar, chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, Ernesto Rodriguez, chairman of the Costa Rican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, Guillermo Arguedas, chairman of the Costa Rica-Korea Institute of Friendship and Culture, and Mario Leon, director of the Costa Rican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, participated in the international signature campaign supporting the three-point charter for Korea's reunification. They signed the signature paper on October 19.
